alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; Mecklenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 6:01PM EDT until May 16 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR EASTERN MECKLENBURG AND SOUTHWESTERN BRUNSWICK COUNTIES... At 600 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Boydton, or 11 miles west of South Hill, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... La Crosse around 620 PM EDT. Brodnax around 625 PM EDT. Ebony around 630 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Rogers Corner, Beechwood, Bracey, Bowens Corner, North View, Finchley, Baskerville, Forksville, Wightman and Lake Gaston. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
